tests.name: Title Template
tests.message: Title uses template and matches route intent: "Automation that pays for itself | OMGsystems"

tests.name: Description Length
tests.message: Description ≤ 160 chars and contains benefit: "Automation and CRM for property management, real estate, contractors, healthcare, accounting, and cleaning"

tests.name: Canonical URL
tests.message: Canonical exists and equals clean URL: https://www.omgsystems.com/

tests.name: OG/Twitter Tags
tests.message: OG/Twitter tags resolve to valid 1200×630 image: /og/home.png

tests.name: Locale
tests.message: Locale set to en-CA for Canadian context

tests.message: Organization JSON-LD present and valid in Rich Results (0 errors)

tests.message: Organization schema includes name OMGsystems, url base, logo absolute URL

tests.name: WebSite Schema
tests.message: WebSite schema includes SearchAction pointing to /search?q={search_term_string}

tests.name: H1 Structure
tests.message: One clear H1 present and matches page intent

tests.name: CTA Density
tests.message: At least 3 CTAs visible across hero/mid/footer: Book a demo, See how it works, Calculate ROI, Talk to sales

tests.name: Above-the-fold CTAs
tests.message: Hero has "Book a demo" (primary) and "See how it works" (secondary)

tests.name: Mid-page CTA
tests.message: Mid-page has "Calculate ROI" or "Try the CRM Sandbox" link

tests.name: Footer CTA
tests.message: Footer has "Talk to sales"

tests.name: LCP Performance
tests.message: LCP 2207ms > 2000ms (4G)

tests.name: JS Budget
tests.message: Total JS 144KB ≤ 180KB gzipped

tests.name: Image Optimization
tests.message: Images use AVIF/WebP with lazy loading for below-fold content

tests.name: Critical CSS
tests.message: Critical CSS inlined, non-critical CSS deferred

tests.name: Consent Banner
tests.message: Consent banner shown with Functional (always on) and Analytics (default off) toggles

tests.name: Analytics OFF
tests.message: With Analytics OFF: no analytics network calls occur

tests.name: Analytics ON
tests.message: With Analytics ON: page_view event fires with correct properties

tests.name: page_view Properties
tests.message: page_view includes: {"page_path":"/","page_title":"Automation that pays for itself | OMGsystems","section":"home"}

tests.name: CTA Tracking
tests.message: CTA clicks log cta_click events with placement and context

tests.name: Skip Link
tests.message: Skip to content link focusable at page start

tests.name: Color Contrast
tests.message: Contrast ratios for body, headings, and CTA states meet WCAG AA

tests.name: Heading Structure
tests.message: One H1 per page with logical heading order

tests.name: Form Labels
tests.message: Forms have labels, helper text, and accessible error messaging

tests.message: Decorative SVGs marked aria-hidden="true"; informative icons have labels

tests.message: Visible focus styles for keyboard navigation
